#Text= Tourist # 1 says : " Excuse me , are we in the Spirit World right now ?

column1: #Text=" Tourist # 1 says : " Is the Spirit World in the ground below us ?
#Text=Can I just get through my cards ?
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " Aw , honey , do n't get flustered .
#Text=" Tourist # 1 says : " Uhh , why is that vine coming toward us ?
#Text=" Ryu says : " Uh ... I do n't see anything about that in the cards .
#Text=" Tourist # 1 says : " I 'm gon na poke it with a stick .
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " This tour is exciting !
#Text=" Ryu 's mother says : " Is n't Ryu the best airbender ever ?
